text:
e="preserve">Enathu Bailey bridge was a Bailey bridge made by Indian Army through Kallada River in Enathu, Pathanamthitta district, Kerala. The bridge is opened for public on 10 April 2017.The bridge is 54.50-metre-long 3.5 metres wide.
In September 2017, the Indian Army dismantle the Bailey bridge, after the maintenance Enathu Bridge got completed..
